text.autoconfig.hidenbt.title: HideNBT
text.autoconfig.hidenbt.option.hideNBT.@: Hides the "NBT Tag(s): #" tooltip on enchanted or modified items.
text.autoconfig.hidenbt.option.hideID.@T: Hides the item's Minecraft ID tooltip.
text.autoconfig.hidenbt.option.hideArmor: Hides the armor material tooltip provided by the Armor Chroma mod.
text.autoconfig.hidenbt.option.sortAttri: Sorts the armor attribute (e.g. Armor Toughness, Knockback Resistance) tooltips alphabetically.
